file_content.text: Thanks again for your help retrieving those research supplies.
Yes? Can I help you with something?
Hold on. Are those the research supplies we were after? I'd given up on them days ago!
You have no idea how much I appreciate this. Some of these chemicals take months to manufacture--not much use to you, but vital to us.
Thank you. You're welcome to use some of our equipment as compensation--I'll make sure to mention you to the commander.
Sorry--I'll get to you as soon as I can. I'm trying to solve a supply problem.
